p: Recently, 3D organometallic halide perovskites with a general formula of ABX 3 (where A is a monovalent organic ammonium cation such as MA + (CH 3NH 2 +) or FA + (CH(NH 2) 2 +), B is a divalent cation such as Pb 2+ or Sn 2+, and X is a monovalent halide anion) have been widely studied in light‐emitting devices (LEDs), 1 solar cells, 2 and photodetectors. 3 These materials have high photoluminescence (PL) purity and broad emission wavelength range, 4 long‐range charge transport, 5 and high absorption coefficients. 6
